pgpuniversal.name: pgpuniversal

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

pgpuniversal.description: A MIB module to describe the statistics provided by PGP Universal Server.

messagesProcessedToday.name: messagesProcessedToday
messagesProcessedToday.description: The number of messages processed today.

messagesEncryptedToday.name: messagesEncryptedToday
messagesEncryptedToday.description: The number of messages encrypted and/or signed today.

messagesDecryptedToday.name: messagesDecryptedToday
messagesDecryptedToday.description: The number of messages decrypted today.

messagesProcessedTotal.name: messagesProcessedTotal
messagesProcessedTotal.description: The number of messages processed total.

messagesEncryptedTotal.name: messagesEncryptedTotal
messagesEncryptedTotal.description: The number of messages encrypted and/or signed total.

messagesDecryptedTotal.name: messagesDecryptedTotal
messagesDecryptedTotal.description: The number of messages decrypted total.

virusesFoundToday.name: virusesFoundToday
virusesFoundToday.description: The number of viruses found today.

messagesInQueue.name: messagesInQueue
messagesInQueue.description: The number of messages currently in the mail queue.
